channel.title: Css on My Blog en Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in Css on My Blog en Hugo

item.title: Cursos programación
item.description: Agrego un listado de cursos de programación que me parecieron interesantes. Esta entrada irá siendo actualizada de cara al futuro. Desarrollo web Full Stack Development with Java Spring Boot, React, and MongoDB – Full Course Spring Boot and Angular Tutorial - Build a Reddit Clone (Coding Project) React with .NET Web API – Basic App Tutorial Razor Pages for ASP.NET Core - Full Course (.NET 6) ASP.NET Core Web API .

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.
